metadata.dc:author: Ferreras, Balbina
Carrillo, Rafael
Sánchez-Alarcos, Santiago
Ramiro, Josefa
metadata.dc:description: Of the patients admitted to our center, 14.44% (26 patients) required evaluation by the Neurosurgery Department. Of these, 29.63% (7 patients) required surgery within 8 hours and 7.69% within the following 48 hours. During the days after the attack, neurological symptoms developed in hospitalized patients.
metadata.dc:title: Neurocirugía.
[Neurosurgery].
